Name: Mother
Text: I know you said you wanted to get alot of [rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]candy[/rainbow] this year, so I have a suprise for you...

Name: Mother
Text: I will drive you to the [wave amp=25.0 freq=15.0 connected=1]good neighborhood![/wave]

Name: Mother
Text: Put on your costume and come out when you are ready.
